WelcomeBanner.subHeader: We helped over 3.500 projects and causes. Sign in today and get your idea kicked off or support others kick off their amazing projects.

LoginForm.sideParagraph: Sign up and discover great opportunities for both helping others and creating your own cause!

AboutUs.paragraph: Get instant helpful resources about anything on the go, easily implement secure money transfer solutions, boost your daily efficiency, connect to other app users and create your own Fronter network, and much more with just a few taps.

HowWorks.sub-header: With just a few minute you can fundraise
HowWorks.paragraph-one: Introduce yourself, your plan and where the place is
HowWorks.sub-header-two: Tell about your idea and event
HowWorks.paragraph-two: Along the way, we will provide advice to help you
HowWorks.paragraph-three: There are many people who want to help you as well

StartNow.paragraph: Start Now and Bring Your Ideas to Life! Create a project and raise funds for your dream venture, or make a difference by donating to projects that align with your passions. Join our community of changemakers today!

NewsLetterCard.header1: Subscribe now and be at the forefront of change!
NewsLetterCard.paragraph: Sign up for our free newsletter to receive our monthly digest of the best causes. Stay informed, get inspired, and make a difference by joining our community of passionate individuals dedicated to shaping the world for the better!

SuccessfulProjects.sub-header: Check out our most recent successful cases

About.header: We are here to support all people and help each other
About.text: OpenHanded is a community-powered fundraising platform. We believe that help is powerful, which is why we are committed to making it safe and easy for anyone to give and get help. Here, our goal is to help organizations generate the funding that is necessary to focus on their core missions of education, community enrichment, scientific research, or charitable giving. We believe that our teams should uphold all unique voices and ethnicities in a way that represents the diversity of our world.

GetStarted.header: Now, you may be thinking on join us
GetStarted.text: We helped over 3,500 projects and causes. Sing in today and get your idea kicked off or support others kick off their amazing projects.

Team.message: If you would like to contact us, we are here !

Mission.header-left: Making life standards better for everyone
Mission.header-right: Being the voice of those who need a help
Mission.text-left: Our mission is to help people help each other by making it safe and easy for people to ask for help and support causes for themselves. We are strongest when everyone feels empowered to bring their whole self to work knowing that they will be included and treated equally.
Mission.text-right: Independence is kind of a core component for living everyone wants, and being a voice for people in need of is giving them that chance to experience. All projects are actually meant to support independence.
